com.rds_software.customers.menarini.projects.odp.frontend.forms

Class OdpSearchForm

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.rds_software.businesslogic.xwebapp.BusinessLogicState
      • com.rds_software.release.commons.businesslogic.simpleforms.SimpleForm
        • com.rds_software.customers.menarini.projects.odp.frontend.forms.OdpAbstractForm
          • com.rds_software.customers.menarini.projects.odp.frontend.forms.OdpSearchForm
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Comparable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    OdpTasksForm

    public class OdpSearchForm
extends OdpAbstractForm
    ODP Search Form for searching payment orders.

    This form provides a comprehensive search interface with multiple criteria:

    • Free text search (searches across all fields)
    • Status filter (dropdown)
    • ODP type filter
    • Company (azienda) filter
    • Amount range (from-to)
    • Creation date range (from-to)
    • Order type filter
    • Invoice arrival flag
    • Historical records flag

    Search results are displayed in an OdpSearchResultsDataGrid below the search criteria. The grid supports user actions for creating new ODPs and editing existing ones.

    This form is part of a tabbed pane interface, grouped with other ODP forms.

    Author:
    RDS Software
    See Also:
    OdpSearchResultsDataGrid, OdpDetailForm
